name: KVP - Kangaroos Vs Platypuses
description:
THIS GAME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS.

Scientists had thought building a Nuclear reactor right next to the Australian Platypus outback was a good idea... They were wrong. The Platypuses overran the countries defenses in a matter of days. Australia's future fell into the pouches of its last line of defense. The Kangaroos. (Insert appropriate kangaroo name here) is the last of his battalion. They took his left arm, but he doesn't plan to go quietly. Help (Insert appropriate kangaroo name here) defend his homeland and take down the Platypus menace.

Version Alpha 1.7 includes:

3 Enemy Types

Boss Platypus

Abilities

Shop

General Awesomeness
